title: 求救~~ ---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
author: 伊藤布哥
txt_content:
我的系統是Ubuntu 15.10
我要怎麼安裝LinuxDisplay?

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ooh. Shiny.

Time: 2015/10/30 下午 9:17
Description: Initializing game

Caused by: org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: No modes available
